Package adris.altoclef.butler

Class Butler

java.lang.Object
adris.altoclef.butler.Butler
public class Butler extends Object
The butler system lets authorized players send commands to the bot to execute.

This effectively makes the bot function as a servant, or butler.

Authorization is defined in "altoclef_butler_whitelist.txt" and "altoclef_butler_blacklist.txt" and depends on the "useButlerWhitelist" and "useButlerBlacklist" settings in "altoclef_settings.json"
